column5: Nevada's health insurance exchange board on Tuesday voted to transfer control over its online program from its vendor  Xerox  to the federal government's enrollment system.

column4: UK insurer Saga cautious on price range for stock market listing
column5: LONDON UK holidays-to-insurance company Saga  has narrowed the price of its London stock market listing towards the bottom of its original range  despite strong demand.

column4: UPDATE 2-UK insurer Saga cautious on price range for stock market listing
column5: LONDON  May 21 UK holidays-to-insurance company Saga has narrowed the price of its London stock market listing towards the bottom of its original range  despite strong demand.

column4: UK insurer Saga cautious on price range for stock market listing
column5: LONDON UK holidays-to-insurance company Saga  has narrowed the price of its London stock market listing towards the bottom of its original range  despite strong demand.

column4: CORRECTED-UK insurer Saga narrows price range for IPO
column5: LONDON  May 21 UK holidays-to-insurance company Saga said on Wednesday that it had narrowed the price range of its London listing to 185-205 pence a share ($3.12-$3.45)  the lower end of the original range  and had closed its retail offering following exceptional demand.
